law.catch_line: Subject to any regulation that the Board adopts, it may reinstate a license that has been revoked....

text.section: Subject to any regulation that the Board adopts, it may reinstate a license that has been revoked.

A license may be reinstated under this section only on:
the affirmative vote of a majority of the members of the Board then serving; and
payment to the Board of a reinstatement fee set by the Board.
